description: A sensor measuring humidity of outside environment.

contents.name: humidity
contents.description: The relative humidity in percentage of full water saturation.

contents.name: humidity_error
contents.description: The real humidity is between `humidity - humidity_error` and `humidity + humidity_error`.

contents.name: min_humidity
contents.description: Lowest humidity that can be reported.

contents.name: max_humidity
contents.description: Highest humidity that can be reported.
